entries.content: Objections are not rejections but information requests.
entries.notes: Implied in the approach to handling objections as opportunities to engage.

entries.content: Use humor to break barriers and make prospects comfortable.
entries.notes: Encourages laughter to open up conversations.

entries.content: Ask 'Is this about currency? Would a little piece of you die?' to engage.
entries.notes: Shows using relatable pain points to connect.

entries.content: Frame objections as a chance to ask 'Why does everybody say that?' to get prospects venting.

focus_area: Objection Mindset: Objections = info requests, not rejections
